metadata.title: CVE-2021-47522 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: HID:bigbenff: prevent null pointer dereference When emulating the devicethrough uhid, there is a chance we don't have output reports and soreport_field is null.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
